name: Commander Kennedy's Final Flight
description:
Greetings, Commander.

They have won.

All we can do now is evacuate. We need you to buy us as much time as you can. I won't lie, you will not return from this mission. However, you can save many lives with your sacrifice.

Good luck.

Commander Kennedy's Final Flight is a simple scrolling shooter, with an emphasis on risk/reward.

- Score attack gameplay!

- Fight against 6 enemy types!

- Grab powerups from escaping shuttles!

- 15 different powerups to help you survive: use one as soon as you get it for an immediate boost, or save up for more impressive effects!

- When you die, do it all again!
